page.title: 10LEISURE TIME IN HATFIELD
page.content: We conducted a survey of our class (average age 13-14 years) to see what people liked to do with their free time. The results were taken and put into a table and the following conclusions were drawn. The most'popular' pasttime was watching television ; all but one of the class watched some telvision every day. Sport of varying kinds was also a favourite activity, FOOTBALL,TENNIS, SHOOTING, ATHLETICS, & CRICKET being the most popular. Reading for pleasure was well supported. Many of the other top pastimes tended to be either directly or indirectly connected with "HIGH TECH" eg video films and computer games. Pop music & related social activities such as discos and youth clubs were popular,especially with girls. Unusual items where rubber collecting and coin games.
